pullRequest.title: DBZ-2650 Migrated release related jobs from JJB to JobDSL

nodes.bodyText: this needs to be moved into the pipeline as pipeline job in job DSL does not have publisher

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,32 @@
+pipelineJob('release-debezium-stage-prod') {
+    displayName('Debezium Stage Product Artifacts')
+    description('Uploads product artifacts into stage location')
+
+    properties {
+        githubProjectUrl('https://github.com/debezium/debezium')
+    }
+
+    logRotator {
+        numToKeep(5)
+    }
+
+    parameters {
+        stringParam('BUILD_VERSION', '', 'Maven artifact id of the product binaries')
+        stringParam('BUILD_VERSION_INCUBATOR', '', 'Maven artifact id of the product binaries in incubator')
+        stringParam('PRODUCT_VERSION', '', 'Product version')
+        stringParam('USERNAME', '', 'Username to log to staging host')
+        stringParam('PASSWORD', 'master', 'Password to log to staging host')
+        stringParam('CONNECTORS', 'mysql postgres mongodb sqlserver', 'The list of released connectors')
+        stringParam('CONNECTORS_INCUBATOR', 'db2', 'The list of released incubating connectors')
+        stringParam('STAGE_FILES', 'false', 'When checked the uploaded artifacts are staged')

commit.message: DBZ-2650 Migrated release related jobs from JJB to JobDSL
DBZ-2650 migrating remaining jobs and cleanup
DBZ-2650 Extended time for source clear job
DBZ-2650 Fixed parameter types in prod release job
DBZ-2650 Fixed build status in release pipeline's result email
DBZ-2650 Correcting upstream job name in nightly image job
DBZ-2650 Fixed job name in strimzi prepare job's result remail
DBZ-2650 syncing release pipeline with master

afterCommit.message: DBZ-2650 syncing release pipeline with master
